statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + 26 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 12 , 2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 4 , 2 \, x^{2} - x + 3 , 5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 3 , x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
